description: Lists all user groups in Amazon QuickSight.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID for the Amazon Web Services account that the group is in. Currently, you use the ID for the Amazon Web Services account that contains your Amazon QuickSight account.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace that you want a list of groups from.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the group.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The principal ID of the group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token that can be used in a subsequent request.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
